nodes.text: The Naboo speeder bus, also referred to as a city shuttle, was a passenger airbus used on the planet of Naboo during the time of the Separatist Crisis.

The speeder bus was similar in appearance to the Magnaline 3000 airbus commonly seen in Galactic City on Coruscant, though this appeared to be a smaller version. Transport links were set up from Theed Spaceport to the Palace Courtyard in Theed, where shuttle buses were permitted to land, provided the area was not packed with tourists or royal watchers. Presumably shuttle buses were authorized to ferry passengers to other points in the city and elsewhere on Naboo.
Anakin Skywalker and Padmé Amidala used a shuttle bus to reach Theed Royal Palace during their stay on Naboo prior to the First Battle of Geonosis.
